meanings.definition: A sugar alcohol used as a sugar substitute.
meanings.sent1: I added xylitol to my coffee instead of sugar.
meanings.sent2: Xylitol is a popular alternative to traditional sweeteners.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf sprinkled xylitol all over the kitchen, thinking it was sugar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as xylitol, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The xylitol crystals sparkled like tiny diamonds on the countertop.

meanings.sent1: The health-conscious baker used xylitol in her recipes.
meanings.sent2: Xylitol is a natural sweetener extracted from plants like birch.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome harvested xylitol from the magical sugar plant.
meanings.sent4: His words were as soothing as xylitol, calming her nerves instantly.
meanings.sent5: The scent of xylitol in the air reminded her of a blooming garden.
